A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where do I start... The movie was plagued with problems: the plot\, the writing\, the poor choices of character development\, the total lack of continuity with TFA\, and so much more. How disappointing this was. I don't care to ever see a Rian Johnson move again in my life. He has ruined so much of what I liked about Star Wars. Ugh... Don't see it.
